resources.string: Война - это когда правительство говорит тебе, кто плохой парень. Революция - когда ты решаешь это сам.
Hello everyone, I wrote this game based on the good old Battle City 1990 game, many things in the game can be different, such as sounds, game rules, mechanics.
Briefly about the rules of the game:
- to win you need to save the life of a cockroach until the end of the time for the current level
- you are given three lives each round
- do not relax, some bots are destroyed after a few hits
- you will have bonuses, use them
- the game is lost if the cockroach is killed
